title: Senior Software Engineer (Java/Python)
description: At ateliware, we believe in impactful well-built products. title: Senior Software Engineer (PHP/Javascript)
description: At ateliware, we believe in impactful well-built products. Our 12 years of experience in the digital transformation of both brazilian, european and north-american markets (we're currently in 6 different countries!) made us reference in performance, technology growth and custom hand-made product delivery. Do you want to be part of it?We rely on experience (hard and soft skills) and willingness to continue learning every day so that we can grow together more and more: we strongly believe in continuous improvement. We value collaboration and mutual respect, we are very curious and constantly face challenges. At the end of the day, we are unbeatable problem solvers.If you identify with this challenge and dream to work with technologies that create real and positive impacts, keep on reading: there's a high chance that you would like to join us.The position available is Senior Software Engineer (PHP/Javascript). You will be an integral part of a multidisciplinary design and development (D&D) team, co-creating digital products for our customers and also for the market in our ateliLAB ‚Äì ateliware's product development laboratory.If you want to take the next step in your career with us, you will be able to work with different technologies and languages. For example, we currently have products being developed in: Elixir, Javascript/Typescript environments (Node, Express, React, Vue, React Native), Python, Ruby, Kotlin and Flutter.By the way, we are a remote first company, that is, working remotely is our standard business ‚Äì but if you are in Curitiba, you can opt for a hybrid model without any problem. In any case, all internal processes remain 100% remote, including the hiring process, which takes place entirely online.We value constant and frequent knowledge sharing, partnership and good conversations, whether in internal events, happy hours with the whole group in our physical office and/or virtual environment and, of course, on a daily basis. We are a united and very collaborative team, and it will be a pleasure to welcome you to our #teamateliware.Responsabilidades e atribui√ß√µesRequisitos e qualifica√ß√µes5+ years of experience with web software engineering (or equivalent experience);Advanced/Fluent English;Solid knowledge in software projects using PHP+Laravel;Knowledge in Javascript/Typescript for backend and frontend with ReactJS or VueJS;Desirable knowledge of market tools that use PHP as a base. For example: Wordpress and Prestashop;Solid knowledge of relational databases such as Postgres or MySQL/MariaDB;Solid knowledge with version control using Git and at least one online repository such as Github or Gitlab;Solid knowledge in unit testing.Informa√ß√µes adicionaisWhat are we going to provide you to do a wonderful job?Competitive remuneration and incentives :)Working in a company with a sensational, flexible and dynamic environment;Here you can be yourself, we need different people with new ideas and mindsets;Opportunity to always work on new projects and with the most modern and diverse technologies;Environment that provides constant learning, always new challenges and a lot of autonomy;The best and most modern tools for you do your job in the best way;Opportunities and help so that you are always learning and studying new things.We can guarantee that it is going to be challenging. But we can also guarantee growth, support from the leadership at all times and lot's of fun. Does all that match with you? Come work with us! :)
